attributes.action: Remove the Bilderberg Shroud of mystery
attributes.additional_details:
It is my understanding that most MPs - especially candidates for Prime Minister are made 'members' of a group known as Bilderberg.

Since the taxes of UK people pay MPs their salaries in order to serve the UK public, we all would like to know:

1. Why our MPs are members of Bilderberg

2. How the membership benefits the UK taxpayer

3. Why no official reports are produced concerning Bilderberg for the employers of MPs (the taxpayer) to see
